title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
description: When using the new class wizard to create a nested class, the context is not correctly determined. This causes issues when trying to access member variables and methods within the nested class.
OB: The new class wizard doesn't correctly determine the context for nested classes.
EB: The new class wizard should correctly determine the context for nested classes, allowing proper access to member variables and methods.
SR: Improve the new class wizard to properly determine the context for nested classes.
